entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
